start_knot: ^Normally I feel at home in the mines, but I'm so glad to be back. What a nightmare!
explainer_loop_knot: ^No worries. It's in the past now.

c-0:
^I was doing my usual nighttime strolling and gathering, avoiding the occasional undead creature. Standard, really.

^Unfortunately I was a bit more boxed-in than usual and had to retreat. Eventually, I was cornered into the ruin that you found me in.

^I won't lie, I'm a bit embarrassed!
c-1: ^Thank you. I'm not sure what would have happened without your help.

planner_knot: ^Any idea what's next for you, now that things have quieted down?
^Probably getting out of town. I want to see what's out there.
^I want to keep building some stuff.
^I'm gonna hang around the house with my cat.

c-0: ^Good for you. I think this is the place for me, but maybe you've got more than coal mining in your future?
c-1: ^You seem to have a knack for it! One of these days, I should get ahold of some new materials for you.
c-2: ^That sounds really nice. You have it all figured out, huh?

complete_knot: ^Anyway, best of luck to you! You've always got a friend here.
